rows.label: qev010902_MSG0001
rows.name:
What happened to Carl!? I just got back
from a mission, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0002
rows.name: They said he's... Ah, what the hell happened?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire about Trevor and Carl's relationship.

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0003
rows.name:
I used to send odd jobs his way. Guy was lazy as
all heck, but you could tell he had potential.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0004
rows.name: And now it's all gone. What a damn waste...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0005
rows.name:
So you guys spared these things, then they came back
and killed Carl?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0006
rows.name:
But you took care of them and they're dead now?
...Okay, good. That's good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0007
rows.name:
To think he used his dying words to worry about
New LA... Heh. Leave it to Carl to put off redeeming
himself till the very last minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010902_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Here. Take this. Consider it thanks for allowing
Carl to rest in peace.[ST:wait ]
